description: Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada , is seeking ,   expertise in the ATIP field for the treatment of highly complex and voluminous files, to be responsible for reviewing and processing of a series of complex files and assist with training the departmental staff and new ATIP analysts.
full_summary:
# Access to Information Consultant _('Consultant en Accès à l''Information)_

### Solicitation Information

*   **Solicitation Number**: 01B68-22-0088
*   **Reference Number**: PW-22-01012161
*   **Publication Date**: 2022-11-02
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 2022-12-12T14:00:00 (expired)
*   **Government Entity**: Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada
*   **Location**: National Capital Region (NCR)

### Brief Description of the Requirement

The Government of Canada is seeking a consultant with expertise in access to information and privacy to support the Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) ATIP Office. The consultant will facilitate the reviewing and processing of complex files, assist with training departmental staff and new analysts, and support the transition to a new software and workflow processes. The consultant will also provide ongoing privacy guidance and analysis on the protection of personal information. Additionally, the consultant will assist with the treatment of highly complex and voluminous files touching on sensitive agriculture matters.

### Key Requirements

*   The consultant must have extensive expertise in the ATIP field.
*   The consultant must be able to manage complex files and provide ongoing privacy guidance and analysis.
*   The consultant must be able to support the transition to a new software and workflow processes.
*   The consultant must have experience with trade issues, fertilizer emissions, and carbon pricing in the agriculture sector.

### Tender Documents

You can find the tender documents on the Canadabuys website:

*   [English version](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/02/03281716c1ed00fcb8d39cabf8cc350b/rfp_22-0088_-_qa_series_2.pdf)
*   [French version](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/23/86542b6634d794d639febca6cb9007eb/rfp_22-0088_-_qa_series_2_fre.pdf)

### Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

*   Harrington, Kyle
*   kyle.harrington@agr.gc.ca

Note: The tender has expired, and this notice is for informational purposes only.
